Reviews.Title: “A pleasant base for exploring Venice”
Reviews.Author: MerlinYork
Reviews.Content: hotel clean venetian standards pleasant base return hours spent exploring venice staff friendly helpful continental breakfast fine sit roof terrace look enjoy breakfast summer dont meals eat venice google maps arent helpful bus station piazzale roma simply walk couple minor bridges grand canal past major bridge grand canal left left brings church st simeon grand left courtyard left hotel entrance slightly left base conveniently located explore venice vaporetta simply wandering maze street direction major attractions frequently signposted rialto st marks hotel isnt grand fine

Reviews.Title: “Our second stay at a great place.”
Reviews.Author: goodie7415
Reviews.Content: stayed twice location short walk bus stop piazzale roma quiet campo clean quiet palace roof top breakfast breakfast fine view nice staff friendly professional accommodating value 90 eurosday

Reviews.Title: “great website awful hotel”
Reviews.Author: davidgreenway
Reviews.Content: terribly disappointing hotel website look lovely quaint reality walls ceilings thin hotel dirty fixtures fittings bad breakfast breakfast staff bit substandard thats polite avoid

Reviews.Title: “TINY ROOM, Dirty Bathroom”
Reviews.Author: Denise L
Reviews.Content: hotel looked terrific literally walk brought suitcases climb suitcases bed didnt add experience bathroom teeny tiny grimy corners larger available following nights stay told americans husband traveled world stayed hotels disliked leave day refund money location ok throngs charming square breakfast outdoor terrace pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Tiny rooms and over-priced”
Reviews.Author: Kev2907
Reviews.Content: based reviews read hotel offer exactly looking common reviews quiet location easy venice standards hotel disappointment tiny 2ft clearance bed floor sloping bathroom absolutely tiny mold rim shower mosquitoes swat check morning couldnt offer breakfast waiter didnt 730 staff night ring hotel square staff nice friendly couldnt recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lovely small hotel excellent location for expolring venice”
Reviews.Author: Michelle2609
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel august located short walk train parks facing onto square staff helpful venice standards breakfast particularly liked roof terrace lift hotel airconditioned location excellent exploring venice experience hotel ai due recommend hotel locationprice helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Back again, and it was just as good!”
Reviews.Author: Joel_Sandra
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel ai due wife returned start trip summer superlatives previous review apply add consistency ai due continues hotel choice venice location perfect short walk train station bus plaza convenient vaporetto stop venetian neighborhood touristy tenminute walk terrific restaurants il salads wonderful pizza la zucca excellent vegetarian dishes meat dishes located near favorite campo venice san giacomo del oro hotel charming reasonably priced stays view grand canal completely clean bathroom cramped tub excellent showerhead breakfast excellent coffee set nicely day staff terrific advance reservations abovementioned restaurants arrived third weekend july major citywide festival wife walk treat actually enter leave touristy venice inclined st marks vaporetto ride look forward stay venice hotel ai due

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay again”
Reviews.Author: princess1
Reviews.Content: hotel suggested travel agent hotel directions spent 35 minutes dragging bags stairs bridges finally arrived hotel woman desk ok reasonable size comforter dirty stained internet downstairs lobby own computer charged 500 euros 3 hours 1000 euros 5 hours 2000 euros 24 hours locked door 1030pm nearby hotel rest staff reasonably friendly little stand offish noisy didnt night sleep foe money paid hotel disappointed paid rome florence 4 star hotels
